mapper.select:
SELECT TABLE_NAME as "NAME" ,TABLE_COMMENT AS "REMARKS" FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES tbl WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' and upper(tbl.TABLE_SCHEMA) in (#{schema})
and
tbl.TABLE_NAME in (${item})
ORDER BY TABLE_NAME

SELECT a.table_name as "TABLE_NAME" , a.column_name as "COLUMN_NAME" , if ( isnull(CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH),NUMERIC_PRECISION, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH ) as "COLUMN_SIZE" , a.data_type as "DATA_TYPE" , a.column_type as "TYPE_NAME_SIZE" , a.is_nullable as "IS_NULLABLE" , a.column_key as "CONSTRAINTS" , a.column_default as "COLUMN_DEF" , a.column_comment as "COMMENT" , a.collation_name as collation_name , a.table_schema as "SCHEMA_NAME" , a.extra as extra FROM information_schema.columns a , INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES tbl where 1=1 and a.TABLE_SCHEMA = tbl.TABLE_SCHEMA and a.TABLE_NAME = tbl.TABLE_NAME and upper(a.TABLE_SCHEMA) in (#{schema}) and tbl.TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'
and
a.table_name in (${item})
order by a.table_name , a.ORDINAL_POSITION

SELECT TABLE_NAME as "NAME" ,TABLE_COMMENT AS "REMARKS" FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES tbl WHERE TABLE_TYPE in ('VIEW', 'SYSTEM VIEW')
and upper(TABLE_SCHEMA) in (#{schema})
and
tbl.name in (${item})
ORDER BY NAME

SELECT a.table_name as "TABLE_NAME" , a.column_name as "COLUMN_NAME" , if ( isnull(CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH),NUMERIC_PRECISION, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH ) as "COLUMN_SIZE" , a.data_type as "DATA_TYPE" , a.column_type as "TYPE_NAME_SIZE" , a.is_nullable as "IS_NULLABLE" , a.column_key as "CONSTRAINTS" , a.column_default as "COLUMN_DEF" , a.column_comment as "COMMENT" , a.collation_name as collation_name , a.table_schema as "SCHEMA_NAME" , a.extra as extra FROM information_schema.columns a , INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES tbl where 1=1 and a.TABLE_SCHEMA = tbl.TABLE_SCHEMA and a.TABLE_NAME = tbl.TABLE_NAME and upper(a.TABLE_SCHEMA) in (#{schema}) and tbl.TABLE_TYPE in ('VIEW', 'SYSTEM VIEW')
and
a.table_name in (${item})
order by a.table_name , a.ORDINAL_POSITION

select routine_name as "NAME" ,routine_comment as "REMARKS" ,created as `CREATED` , '' as "STATUS" from information_schema.ROUTINES where 1=1 and routine_schema =#{schema} and routine_type = 'PROCEDURE'

select a.routine_name as "OBJECT_NAME" , a.routine_comment as "COMMENT" , a.created as `CREATED` ,'' as "STATUS" ,p.PARAMETER_NAME as ARGUMENT_NAME ,p.DATA_TYPE as DATA_TYPE ,p.parameter_mode as "IN_OUT" ,p.ORDINAL_POSITION as "SEQUENCE" from information_schema.ROUTINES a left outer join information_schema.parameters p on a.ROUTINE_SCHEMA =p.SPECIFIC_SCHEMA and a.specific_name = p.specific_name where 1=1 and a.ROUTINE_SCHEMA =#{schema}
and a.routine_type = 'PROCEDURE'
and a.routine_type = 'FUNCTION'
and a.routine_type =#{objectType}
and
a.routine_name in (${item})
order by a.routine_name , p.ORDINAL_POSITION

select routine_name as "NAME" ,routine_comment as "REMARKS" ,created as `CREATED` , '' as "STATUS" from information_schema.ROUTINES where 1=1 and upper(routine_schema) =#{schema} and routine_type = 'FUNCTION'
SELECT index_name as "NAME" , index_type , comment ,'' as "STATUS" FROM information_schema.statistics WHERE upper(TABLE_SCHEMA) in (#{schema})

SELECT idx.table_name AS "TABLE_NAME" ,idx.index_name AS "INDEX_NAME" ,idx.seq_in_index AS "ORDINAL_POSITION" ,idx.column_name AS "COLUMN_NAME" ,idx.index_type AS "TYPE" , idx.collation AS ASC_OR_DESC FROM information_schema.statistics idx WHERE upper(TABLE_SCHEMA) in (#{schema})
and
idx.index_name in (${item})
order by table_name , seq_in_index

SELECT trigger_name as "NAME" , event_manipulation as event , event_object_table as "TABLE_NAME" , action_statement , action_timing as timing , created as "CREATED" ,'' as "STATUS" FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TRIGGERS WHERE upper(TRIGGER_SCHEMA) in (#{schema})
and
trigger_name in (${item})
ORDER BY trigger_name

SELECT trigger_name as "OBJECT_NAME" , event_manipulation as "EVENTTYPE" , event_object_table as "TABLE_NAME" , action_statement , action_timing as timing , created as "CREATED" ,'' as "STATUS" FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TRIGGERS WHERE upper(TRIGGER_SCHEMA) in (#{schema})
and
trigger_name in (${item})
ORDER BY trigger_name
